### 3. Data Preprocessing

```{r preprocessing}

## TODO: Spillover Correction using spillover() function and Spillover Matrix 
#spillovermatrix <- spillover(x = fcs, )
#compensate(x = fcs, spillover = spillovermatrix)

## Data Pre-Gating
pregating <- function(x, pregate) {
  message(paste("Applying Pregate", pregate));
  if (grepl("<", pregate, fixed=TRUE)) {filterargs <- strsplit(pregate, split = "<")[[1]]; exprs2 <- dplyr::filter(x, filterargs[1] < as.numeric(filterargs[2]) ) };
  if (grepl(">", pregate, fixed=TRUE)) {filterargs <- strsplit(pregate, split = ">")[[1]]; exprs2 <- dplyr::filter(x, filterargs[1] > as.numeric(filterargs[2]) ) };
  num_removed <- dim(x)[1] - dim(exprs2)[1] 
  print(paste("Pregate", pregate, "applied succesfully.", num_removed, "cells have been filtered out.")) 
  return(exprs2) }

pregates <- strsplit(params$pregates, split = " ")[[1]] 
for (pregate in pregates) {exprs <- pregating(exprs, pregate)}

## Channel Description
pregating_channels <- strsplit(params$pregating_channels, split = " ")[[1]]
pregating_channels <- pregating_channels[pregating_channels %in% colnames(exprs)]
instrument_channels <- strsplit(params$instrument_channels, split = " ")[[1]]
instrument_channels <- instrument_channels[instrument_channels %in% colnames(exprs)]
lineage_channels <- unlist(colnames(exprs))[!unlist(colnames(exprs)) %in% c(pregating_channels,instrument_channels)]

## Make colnames human readable using information in the parameter data slot
if (params$markernames) {
  markers <- gsub(pattern = ".*_", replacement = "", x = as.vector(fcs@parameters@data$desc));
  colnames(exprs)[which(!is.na(markers))] <- markers[which(!is.na(markers))]
}
```

### 4. Clustering for Area Overlap Frequency Calculation

```{r clustering, echo = TRUE, results='hold', message=FALSE}

## Cluster Data and calculate AOF for each sample
AOFScores <- list()
exprs$Sample <- NA
for (sample in 1:samplenumber) {
  message(paste("\nClustering Sample",sample,"out of", samplenumber))
  sampledata <- dplyr::filter(exprs, exprs$FileNum == sample)
  Rphenograph_out <- Rphenograph::Rphenograph(sampledata[,lineage_channels], k = 30)
  AOF <- greedyCytometryAof(fcs_data = sampledata[,lineage_channels], y = Rphenograph_out[[2]]$membership)
  AOFScores[[sample]] <- column_to_rownames(.data = AOF, var = "ChannelName")
   
  ## Artificially spread data on x-axis instead of single value per sample
  sampledata <- dplyr::select(sampledata, -starts_with("Sample"))
  sampledata$Sample <- rnorm(n = length(sampledata$FileNum), mean = sample, sd = 0.1)
  exprs <- dplyr::full_join(exprs, sampledata[c("Time","Sample")], by = c("Time"))
}

```

### 5. Calculate & Output Score Tables & Graphs

```{r scoring, warning = FALSE }

## Set up Scoring Tables
scoretypes <- strsplit(params$scores, split = ",")[[1]] 
nr  <- samplenumber
nc  <- length(scoretypes)
ndf <- length(lineage_channels)
scores <- setNames(replicate(ndf,setNames(as.data.frame(matrix(nrow = nr, ncol = nc)),scoretypes),simplify=FALSE),lineage_channels)

## Set up Output Folder
if (params$markernames) {dir.create(file.path(outputdir, "Markers"))} else {dir.create(file.path(outputdir, "Metals"))}
if (params$markernames) {setwd(file.path(outputdir, "Markers"))} else {setwd(file.path(outputdir, "Metals"))}

## Score Titrations
bestsamples <- list()
for (marker in lineage_channels) {
  maxexpression <- quantile(exprs[,marker], 0.99)
  scores$marker <- as.data.frame(scores$marker)
  for (sample in 1:samplenumber) {
    sampledata <- dplyr::filter(exprs, exprs$FileNum == sample)[,marker]
    scores[[marker]][sample,scoretypes[1]] <- round((quantile(as.numeric(sampledata), 0.99)) / maxexpression, 2)
    #scores[[marker]][sample,scoretypes[2]] <- round(log((1-AOFScores[[sample]][marker,"Aof"])*100,10)/2,2)
    scores[[marker]][sample,scoretypes[2]] <- round(1-AOFScores[[sample]][marker,"Aof"],2)
    scores[[marker]][sample,scoretypes[3]] <- round(sqrt(sample / 10), 2)
  }
  
  ## Corrections for Intensity Scores
  scores[[marker]][,scoretypes[1]] <- round(scores[[marker]][,scoretypes[1]] / (max(scores[[marker]][,scoretypes[1]])),2)
  scores[[marker]][scores[[marker]] == "NaN"] <- 0
  
  ## Calculate & Print Optimal Score
  scores[[marker]][,scoretypes[4]] <- round(rowMeans(scores[[marker]][,1:3]),2)
  bestsamples[[marker]] <- as.numeric(rownames(scores[[marker]])[which.max(scores[[marker]]$`Overall / Weighted Score`)])
  print(paste("Scores for Marker", marker)); print(scores[[marker]])
  
  ## Plot & Save Plot
  plot(exprs[,c("FileNum", marker)], pch=".", col = exprs$FileNum, main=marker)
  rect(xleft = bestsamples[[marker]]-0.5, ybottom = 0, xright = bestsamples[[marker]]+0.5, ytop = max(exprs[,marker]), border = "red")
  if (params$markernames) {png(paste(marker,".png", sep = ""))} else {png(paste(marker,".png", sep = ""))}
  plot(exprs[,c("FileNum", marker)], pch=".", col = exprs$FileNum, main=marker)
  rect(xleft = bestsamples[[marker]]-0.5, ybottom = 0, xright = bestsamples[[marker]]+0.5, ytop = max(exprs[,marker]), border = "red")
  dev.off()
  
  ## Write Marker-Specific Score Table
  write.table(t(as.data.frame(scores[[marker]])), sep = "\t", file = paste(marker," Scores.tsv", sep = ""), col.names = TRUE)}

## Write Summary Table
setwd(outputdir)
write.table(t(as.data.frame(bestsamples)), sep = "\t", file = "Optimal Marker Concentrations.tsv", col.names = FALSE)

## Write R Workspace for future analysis
save.image(file = "R Workspace.Rdata")
```
